relevant_findings.eyes: PERLL, EOMI, subconjunctival hemorrhage noted in right eye, anicteric
relevant_findings.ENT: no sinus tenderness, MMM, oropharynx without exudate or lesions, no supraclavicular or cervical lymphadenopathy, no JVD
relevant_findings.respiratory: fine crackles lower lung bases, otherwise clear to auscultation
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: NS1/S2, regular rate and rhythm, systolic murmur noted
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: soft, non-tender bowel sounds, mildly distended, tender to palpation over epigastrium and RUQ, overall diffusely tender, no rebound or guarding noted
relevant_findings.extremities: denies calf tenderness, +2 dorsal pedis pulses
relevant_findings.neurological: alert, oriented to self, time, date, and reason for hospitalization, cranial nerves II-XII intact
